definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: His letter is just a self-serving and self promotion.
sentences.chinese: 他写的这信不过是自吹自擂来提高自己的声望。

sentences.english: I cannot depend (up) on his word.
From oneself benefits to say, also can not believe these people.
sentences.chinese: 从自己利益来说，也信不过这些人。

sentences.english: Oh, no, I wouldn't trust myself with a car that nice.
sentences.chinese: 不了，开这么漂亮的车，我信不过自己。

sentences.english: He said the car was safe but I just don't trust him.
sentences.chinese: 他说那辆车安全，但我就是信不过他。

sentences.english: I don't trust some of these smart salesmen.
sentences.chinese: 这些精明的推销员中有一些人我信不过。

sentences.english: He said the car was safe but I just do not trust him.
sentences.chinese: 他说那辆车安全，但是我就是信不过他。

sentences.english: You seem mistrustful even of your friends.
sentences.chinese: 看来你连自己的朋友都信不过了。

sentences.english: Commercial websites that are trying to sell a product cannot be trusted to tell you the truth about issues related to that product.
sentences.chinese: 销售产品的商业网站上与产品有关的信息信不过。

definition: to show respect for/to think highly of
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

definition: to ask a question, already knowing the answer
to inconvenience/to trouble (sb with a request)
to arbitrarily assert/to allege/to stick to one's statement/to cling to one's view
